results.prompt: Identify the top three countries with the largest increase in transport emissions between 2020 and 2023. Highlight priority areas for mitigation.
results.answer: I encountered an error while processing your question: HTTP error 422: {"detail":[{"type":"missing","loc":["body","file_id"],"msg":"Field required","input":{"select":"country_name, year, emissions_tonnes, MtCO2","from":"transport-year","where":"year IN (2020, 2023)","order_by":"MtCO2 DESC","limit":3,"assist":true}},{"type":"list_type","loc":["body","select"],"msg":"Input should be a valid list","input":"country_name, year, emissions_tonnes, MtCO2"},{"type":"dict_type","loc":["body","where"],"msg":"Input should be a valid dictionary","input":"year IN (2020, 2023)"}]}
